price: 27. Allah wil jullie berouw accepteren, maar degenen die hun lusten volgen, wensen dat jullie ver zullen afdwalen van het rechte pad.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُواْ مَيۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yurīdu an yatūba ʿalaykum wayurīdu alladhīna yattabiʿūna al-shahawāti an tamīlū maylan ʿaẓīman
